name: Different Handcursers For Different Links (Mac) P1
description:
To use this you have to install part 2 to ( http://userstyles.org/styles/16287 )

Changes your Cursers for different hyperlinks

shows special hand for:
-jpg, png, bmp, gif, raw, psd, tif
-mp3, aac, wav, wma, flac
-flv, avi, mpeg, divx
-secure site links
-zip, rar, iso
-mov, ram
-new tab
-xls, xml
-txt, doc
-email
-pdf
-exe

Complete new icons!!! If you want some other cursers make a suggestion ;-)
enjoy

if you find a bug send me a comment

actual version 2.0
